description: works like a charm for game capturing or just window capturing aswell. and it looks amazing compared to obs's window capture + no fps drop because everything is done on the gpu like it should be! (im looking at you obs). Great gui with multi audio options and you can even stream, tho it seems youtube and twitch seem to get a bit freaked out by the amount bitrate your sending to the server so hopefully that gets fixed or it might already be fixed i havent tried in a while. anyways great app
summary: THE BEST game capture software ever for nvidia gpus

description: Works well on nvidia gpus but does currently not support amd (steam deck)

This is my current favorite screen recorder because it's lightweight, has simple yet functional options and instant replay. It also utilizes nvidia GPUs, so thats pretty nice. Support for Wayland would be 10/10 but I'm not sure whether that's possible or not.
summary: This is my favorite screen recorder

description: looks pretty good, saw it before and heard good things about it. will try compared to obs flatpak

Nice and tiny alternative for the great 'OBS-Studio'. Renders and works direct in the GPU(NVidia) = less framedrops.
Simple and logical User Interface. 
[replay: 60fps + 1080p + 600sec= ~1,4GiB //Better use SSD (for higher settings)]
No permite grabar el archivo de grabación
